body: Hi Everyone,  I'm new on Ladybug + Honeybee and this is happening with some of my components. Can someone help me solve this?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vXmFHq1ldXBLWnTMIrmnQ9ZhUKKbdcBLrPUkXooGemsB7cyxfExnAVkATc6O6ZtSbnitlF3Daof-Od*oe6E0l-*dYtnSUGyW/error.JPG)

replies.body: Thank you Mohammed, but I follew all these instrucstions and still doesn't work! :(

Luiza,

Did you install and check the GhPython in the grasshopper components folder?

Right-click the GhPython file >> in Properties >> make sure there is no "**blocked**" text (select"unblock").

For more info see **[Mostapha's](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-installation-problems)** post like this issue.



-Omid
Thank you Omid! I'll try that
The GhPython 0.6.0.3  wasn't working, had to download the earlier version
